But given Eric Schmidt 's success,`` the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years.'' It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, David Wise added. State of the Union edition time pubdate datetime=`` 2011-01-27T17:14:24-05:00''> Mike Pence won't run for president, but will likely run for IN governor Indianapolis Star on the news that will disappoint some national conservatives: U.S. Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. `` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana,'' Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.``

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
